text:
The attribute to use to set the repository build dir for icontract is documented as repositoryBuildDir, while it's in fact repBuildDir.

Cheers,

Samuel
creator: sam@verdonne.org

text:
actually this parameter is ignored, and there are some other icontract  options (e.g. not compiling instrumented sources) that one would be able to change. 
I'll try to post a patch ASAP.
creator: sam@verdonne.org

text:
The docs have been patched.

Yes, looks as if that attribute would get ignored - I'm degrading this to 
enhancement, feel free to come back and attach your patch when it is ready.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
IContract has been removed as you cannot get the JARS any more from anyone; it
is a dead task. Sorry.
creator: stevel@apache.org
